ch0117_00_royalmask/0101_0701_01_10:
Discovery! New experiences! Adventure! It’s all
yours if you want it, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0117_00_royalmask/0101_0701_02_10:
You’ve got hopes and dreams—I can see it in
your eyes! Get out there and show us what
you got!
ch0117_00_royalmask/7101_0701_01_10:
Be sure to prepare everything you need
before you go out exploring!
ch0117_00_royalmask/7101_0701_02_10:
What you’ll need is... Passion! Motivation! Grit!
Fighting spirit! Courage! Ambition!
ch0117_00_royalmask/7101_0701_03_10:
And more than anything else, you need
a kind heart that cares for your beloved
partner Pokémon!
ch0117_00_royalmask/7102_0701_01_10: Winning isn’t everything in battles, you know.
ch0117_00_royalmask/7102_0701_02_10:
Sometimes, the frustration you feel from losing is
exactly what makes you stronger!
ch0117_00_royalmask/7103_0701_01_10:
A strong and healthy body builds a strong and
healthy mind!
ch0117_00_royalmask/7103_0701_02_10:
It’s always best to make sure your body is in top
shape, yeah!
ch0117_00_royalmask/7104_0701_01_10:
The Battle Royal in Alola lets four Trainers battle it
out at the same time!
ch0117_00_royalmask/7104_0701_02_10:
But the Pokémon battles on Pasio are
fascinating, too!
ch0117_00_royalmask/7104_0701_03_10:
Here, the joy of winning is shared between you
and your teammates! It’s an exciting experience
unique to Pasio!
ch0117_00_royalmask/7105_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]... I know
exploring can be super challenging at times.
ch0117_00_royalmask/7105_0701_02_10:
But do your best to keep your spirits up and your
motivation high! And if you’re ever feeling down,
I’m always here for you!
ch0117_00_royalmask/7105_0701_03_10:
We can laugh or cry together over a nice meal,
and that’ll help us both be ready to take on a
new day!
ch0117_00_royalmask/1701_0701_01_10:
I’ve been looking all over for you! Here, you can
have this!
ch0117_00_royalmask/1701_0701_02_10:
Make sure you’re fully prepared before you step
into the ring!
ch0117_00_royalmask/1701_0702_01_10:
I’m looking forward to seeing what you can do!
Woo, yeah!
ch0117_00_royalmask/2501_0701_01_10:
I’m here to teach you, oh yeah, about the Battle
Royal! Woo! Is there anyone here who can light
the flames in my heart?
ch0117_00_royalmask/2501_0701_02_10:
Hey, you! Yeah, I’m talking to you! I’m impressed
by how much you’ve grown!
ch0117_00_royalmask/2501_0701_03_10:
I’m rootin’ for you! Woo! Keep up the good work
and charge full speed ahead!
ch0117_00_royalmask/2501_0701_04_10:
You just gotta stand stronger and fight harder!
And then, fight even harder than that!
ch0117_00_royalmask/2501_0702_01_10:
I know you’d do great if you gave the Battle Royal
a shot!
ch0117_00_royalmask/2501_0702_02_10: If you ever visit Alola, you should give it a go!
ch0117_00_royalmask/2511_0701_01_10:
In Alola, I have a lot of fans rooting for me as a
pro wrestler, but that’s not the case here on Pasio.
ch0117_00_royalmask/2511_0701_02_10:
No matter where I am, I’ll continue to work hard
on improving myself!
ch0117_00_royalmask/2511_0701_03_10:
That’s what a true Champion does! And that’s how
I wanna be!
ch0117_00_royalmask/2511_0702_01_10: I hope you’re able to find your best self, too.
ch0117_00_royalmask/2511_0702_02_10:
Even if you wanna be strong, there are different
kinds of strong, y’know?
ch0117_00_royalmask/2511_0702_03_10:
The better you can picture what you wanna
achieve, the closer you’ll get to reaching it!
ch0117_00_royalmask/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! An energetic morning greeting
pumps me up for the rest of the day, yeah!
ch0117_00_royalmask/3003_0701_01_10:
You can always take a nap if you start to feel
tired. Adventure awaits in the afternoon, too!
ch0117_00_royalmask/3005_0701_01_10:
Good evening! There are plenty of adventures at
night, too. Just don’t stay out too late!
